attributes.action: require websites with accounts to provide a "close account" option
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many websites require users to create accounts with username, password, and sometimes personal data such as name, address, and in many cases credit card. But few websites seem to allow users to close their account (and have their data erased). This petition is to make the ability to close an account mandatory. To give just two examples: First Great Western don't allow you to close or even deactivate an account. Facebook allow you to deactivate but not to close.
